title: Don’t Obsess Over The Crosstabs!
description:
Galen and Nate discuss the reasons for Republicans' improvement in the forecast. They also explain why a dramatic shift among independent women in a recent New York Times poll shouldn't be taken at face value — but also shouldn't undercut the poll.
Tickets to the FiveThirtyEight Politics podcast live show in Washington, DC on October 25th can be found here.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
